= Introduction =
Documentation for [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Wrapper/ Wrapper component].

= Details =
The [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Wrapper/ Wrapper component] allows wrapping of classes and objects in order to manipulate them in a dynamic way.

The implementation is hidden behind a [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Wrapper/API/OxICWrapperFactory.h WrapperFactory]-

A [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Wrapper/Impl/Simple/ simple implementation] is provided.

The interface style is taken from [http://static.springsource.org/spring/docs/3.0.5.RELEASE/reference/validation.html Spring Bean Wrapper].

= Ideas =
  * Provide a more sophisticated implementation with chained property access (using dot in property name). Maybe it works, since current implementation uses key-value coding.
